query:
ALTER TABLE dailyLogs 
ADD COLUMN wateringVolume INT NULL COMMENT 'Volume regado em ml',
ADD COLUMN runoffCollected INT NULL COMMENT 'Runoff coletado em ml',
ADD COLUMN runoffPercentage DECIMAL(5,2) NULL COMMENT 'Calculado: (runoffCollected / wateringVolume) * 100';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 28MX9rHeRYrkZKS.5ffbe178d99f --database AhyBXV9CDav4cSFRqphBxc --execute ALTER TABLE dailyLogs 
ADD COLUMN wateringVolume INT NULL COMMENT 'Volume regado em ml',
ADD COLUMN runoffCollected INT NULL COMMENT 'Runoff coletado em ml',
ADD COLUMN runoffPercentage DECIMAL(5,2) NULL COMMENT 'Calculado: (runoffCollected / wateringVolume) * 100';
